column5: Whether you like this guy or not he knows how to catch big muskies..supposedly 97 over 50" in his career..films shows all over the place but comes to Cedar Lake Lodge for the opener for several years running now..last year caught a 54" while filming his show.. to me he comes off as a little arrogant on his show but in person he's a pretty nice guy..Hard to believe that Cedar Lake at only 6500 acres is a class A musky lake in NW Ontario but it is...this past trip our 7 guys saw 55 muskies..wish I cared about muskies but I dont...here is a link from the Cedar Lake Lodge website with pics from the show...dont know when it will air..just scroll downtourworld.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=627&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start =45
